channel.title: Ultrasound Simulation on José Ignacio Orlando
channel.description: Recent content in Ultrasound Simulation on José Ignacio Orlando

item.title: Ultrasound simulation
item.description: Ultrasound (US) ia fast, low cost imaging technique that is widely use in emergency rooms. As part of this project, we are developing an automated system for US simulation, that allows to produce realistic US scans from segmented CT volumes of real patients.
